entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
